message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $70, you get $30. It's in your best interest to accept now, as the money will be worth less with each passing round.
I think it's more fair to split the money more evenly. This way, we both get a decent amount, and we can avoid the risk of the money becoming less valuable.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is getting worse for me and you're still losing out! Let's be reasonable, I'll take $65 and you get $35 before it depreciates even further.
